en.name: Name:
en.nopizzavisit: No pizza visit yet. Add one!
en.tokenfailure: invalid token, not saved, maybe typo?
en.reserved: OCD... Buttons have to come in pairs lol
en.helptext-travel:
✈️: tracks travel details ✈️🚗🏨, no more going back to email over and over just to pull up landing time!

  • ✈️: add flight detail.
  • 🚗: add rental car detail.
  • 🏨: add hotel detail.
  • 📅: add activity and other reservation detail.
  • 🧳: search all items for selected trip.
  • 📜: View history with filter & sort options.
en.helptext-drink:
🍹: tracks drinks 🧋🍺☕, remember favorite flavors!

  • ➕: Add a new visit at any time.
  • 📜: View history with filter & sort options.
  • 📊: See summaries with simple stats like favorite shop, favorite flavor etc.
en.helptext-restaurant-pizza:
🍕: Pizza day — I made a vow to eat pizza with my husband once every two months, lol.

Top is a 60 day count down for when to have next pizza!
en.helptext-summary:
📊: See summaries with simple stats.

  • 🕒: Select range for how much data to load.
  • GroupBy: group data by selected column(s).
  • AggBy: show selected column(s) for grouped data.
en.helptext-history:
📜: View history with filter & sort options.

  • 🕒: Select range for how much data to load.
  • 🔍: Filter by selected column.
  • ▲▼: click on column to sort, toggle between asc/dsc.
en.helptext-restaurant:
🍽️: Track restaurants! Never go to the same bad place again!

  • ➕: Add a new rstaurant visit or meal at home at any time.
  • 📜: View history with filter & sort options.
  • 📊: See summaries with simple stats like calories per day, top 5 most visited places etc.
  • 🍕: Pizza day — I made a vow to eat pizza with my husband once every two months, lol.
en.helptext:
Welcome to yn website!

  • 🍽️: tracks restaurants! Nerver go to same bad place again!
  • 🍹: tracks drinks 🧋🍺☕, remember favorite flavors!
  • ✈️: tracks travel details ✈️🚗🏨, no more going back to email over and over just to pull up landing time!
  • 🎮: tracks hobbies! 🎬📺🐉,🧱📈🏋️💡.
  • ❤️: tracks health. abnormal symptoms etc
  • 🐾: tracks pets! flee & tick, bath schedule, fun memories, abnormal behavior

Your data is saved locally for quick access.
☁️: enable cloud save/load to use across devices by setting your Google Apps Script token, see Instruction.

For more info, see README.

ch.name: 名称:
ch.nopizzavisit: 还没有披萨记录，快添加一个吧！
ch.tokenfailure: 未保存无效令牌, 输入错误？
ch.reserved: 强迫症！按钮必须是双数哈哈哈
ch.helptext-travel:
✈️: 记录旅行详情 ✈️🚗🏨，不用再一次次翻软件找落地时间啦！

  • ✈️: 添加航班信息。
  • 🚗: 添加租车信息。
  • 🏨: 添加酒店信息。
  • 📅: 添加活动和其他预订信息。
  • 🧳: 按行程名称搜索所有项目。
  • 📜: 查看历史，支持筛选和排序。
ch.helptext-drink:
🍹喝: 记录饮品 🧋🍺☕，记住你最喜欢的口味！

  • ➕: 随时添加新的记录.
  • 📜: 查看历史记录，支持筛选和排序。
  • 📊: 查看简单统计数据，如最爱的店，最爱的口味等。
ch.helptext-restaurant-pizza:
🍕: 披萨日——我结婚誓言是为了他每两个月吃一次披萨哈哈。

本页包含60天的倒计时
ch.helptext-summary:
📊: 查看简单统计数据。

  • 🕒: 选择数据的时间范围。
  • 分组: 按选择的列对数据进行分组（可多选）。
  • 汇总: 显示这些统计值。
ch.helptext-history:
📜: 查看历史记录，支持筛选和排序。

  • 🕒: 选择数据的时间范围。
  • 🔍: 按选择的列进行筛选。
  • ▲▼: 点击列标题进行排序，可切换升序/降序。
ch.helptext-restaurant:
🍽️吃: 记录餐厅！再也不踩重复的雷！

  • ➕: 随时添加新的餐厅/做饭记录。
  • 📜: 查看历史记录，支持筛选和排序。
  • 📊: 查看简单统计数据，如每日摄入的卡路里、最常去的前五个餐厅等。
  • 🍕: 披萨日——我结婚誓言是为了他每两个月吃一次披萨哈哈。
ch.helptext:
欢迎来到 yn 网站！

  • 🍽️吃: 记录餐厅！再也不踩重复的雷！
  • 🍹喝: 记录饮品 🧋🍺☕，记住你最喜欢的口味！
  • ✈️玩: 记录旅行细节 ✈️🚗🏨，不必一遍又一遍地翻软件来查看降落时间！
  • 🎮乐: 记录兴趣爱好！🎬📺🐉，🧱📈🏋️💡。
  • ❤️: 记录健康。异常症状等
  • 🐾: 记录宠物！驱虫、洗澡时间表，美好回忆，异常行为等等

你的数据保存在本地方便快速访问。
☁️: 启用云端保存/加载，实现不同设备间的数据共享。需设置 Google Apps Script TOKEN，参见 说明。

更多信息，请查看 README。
